com.example.dada.Controller

类 UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.dada.Controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    User model's controller, a glue between Activity and Model. Give access for activity(View) to modify and update model.

      The constructor

    • 构造器详细资料

      • UserController

        public UserController(OnAsyncTaskCompleted listener)
        The constructor
        参数:
        listener - the task to do after async task is done.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
             throws UserException
        Create a new user
        参数:
        user - The user to be created
        抛出:
        UserException - Raise exception when username has been taken

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User user,
                       java.lang.String oldUserName)
                throws UserException
        Update user profile
        参数:
        user - The user to be created
        oldUserName - The old user name
        抛出:
        UserException - Raise exception when username has been taken

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Retrive user profile from the server
        参数:
        username - the username to search
        返回:
        The user object
